HO evidence-informed nutrition 
recommendations and the underlying evidence. eLENA also includes topics on which evidence has 
started to accumulate but are still not the object of WHO guidance.
The guideline process does not end with the publication of a document, but continues with 
dissemination and assistance to policy-makers to adapt the guidance to the country context. 
Additional operational tools are often required, including analysis of cost and cost-effectiveness. 
Costing is addressed
